news.title: 梅拉尼娅纪录片导演现身爱泼斯坦文件亲密照
news.title0: Melania director Brett Ratner pictured cuddling woman in Epstein files
news.content: 美国第一夫人梅拉尼娅·特朗普新纪录片的导演布雷特·拉特纳，出现在最新公布的爱泼斯坦文件中，照片显示他与一名年轻女子拥抱。
news.content0: The director of the new documentary on US First Lady Melania Trump has appeared embracing a young woman in images released by the US Department of Justice on Friday.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 五岁男童与父亲被ICE拘留后获释返家
news.title0: Boy, 5, and father detained by ICE return to Minnesota after release
news.content: 美国一名五岁男童及其父亲在明尼苏达州被移民与海关执法局拘留后，经法官紧急命令获释，现已返回家中。
news.content0: A five-year-old boy and his father who were detained by Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) in Minnesota have returned home, a congressman has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 尼日利亚歌手遭蛇咬后不幸身亡
news.title0: Aspiring Nigerian singer dies after being bitten by a snake
news.content: 尼日利亚一名曾参加《好声音》节目的26岁女歌手在首都阿布贾被蛇咬伤，因医院缺少特定抗蛇毒血清，最终不治身亡。
news.content0: There has been an outpouring of grief in Nigeria following the death of an aspiring singer who died on Saturday after being bitten by a snake in the capital, Abuja.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 洛杉矶奥组委主席为与麦克斯韦调情邮件致歉
news.title0: LA 2028 Olympics chief 'deeply regrets' flirty emails with Ghislaine Maxwell
news.content: 洛杉矶2028年奥运会组委会主席凯西·瓦瑟曼为其二十多年前与爱泼斯坦同伙吉斯莱恩·麦克斯韦的调情邮件表示“深感遗憾”。
news.content0: The chairman of the Los Angeles 2028 Olympic Games has said he "deeply regrets" decades-old flirty emails with Ghislaine Maxwell - the jailed associate of convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 伊朗最高领袖警告美国攻击将引发地区战争
news.title0: Iran's supreme leader warns of regional war if US attacks
news.content: 伊朗最高领袖哈梅内伊警告称，若美国对伊朗发动攻击，将引发一场地区性战争。
news.content0: Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has warned that any attack on his country would spark a regional conflict, as the US continues to build up its forces nearby.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 阿尔卡拉斯击败德约科维奇首夺澳网冠军
news.title0: Carlos Alcaraz makes history with Australian Open title after defeating Novak Djokovic in enthralling men’s final
news.content: 西班牙网球名将卡洛斯·阿尔卡拉斯在澳网男单决赛中逆转击败诺瓦克·德约科维奇，成为最年轻的男子职业全满贯得主。
news.content0: Carlos Alcarazbecame the youngest man ever to complete a career grand slam on Sunday, adding the Australian Open title to his trophy cabinet after defeatingNovak Djokovicin an enthralling men’s final.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 乌克兰和平谈判因俄美会晤推迟
news.title0: Ukraine Peace Talks Delayed After Russia and U.S. Meet
news.content: 原定于阿布扎比举行的第二轮乌克兰和平谈判被推迟，此前俄罗斯和美国特使在佛罗里达举行了意外会晤。
news.content0: A second round of trilateral talks to end the war in Ukraine has been postponed for several days after a surprise meeting this weekend between Russian and U.S. negotiators in Florida.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 印尼有条件解除对马斯克AI聊天机器人Grok的禁令
news.title0: Indonesia Lifts Ban on Grok After New Assurances From X Corp
news.content: 印尼通信部宣布，在收到X公司的改进承诺后，有条件解除对埃隆·马斯克旗下AI聊天机器人Grok的禁令。
news.content0: Indonesia lifted a ban on Grok, Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot, on Sunday, weeks afterit announced it was blocking the toolbecause it was being used to generate sexualized images of real people.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 南安普顿大学医院火灾致重大损失
news.title0: Major incident declared after fire causes 'significant damage' at University Hospital Southampton
news.content: 英国南安普顿大学医院发生火灾，造成“重大损失”，超过200名患者被转移，当局宣布发生重大事件。
news.content0: A major incident has been declared after a fire caused "significant damage" at a hospital.
news.author: Sky News
